comment._content: I used to do this as a child, in the Indian Ocean off Onslow. Without the harness.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sarahbrabazon] It certainly stopped a while ago on the Great Barrier Reef :) We have some other items in the collection regarding turtle riding and racing. An interesting past-time of the past...
